quoteText: We reserve the right to make changes or modifications to these Terms, or any policy or guideline of our Services, at any time and in our sole discretion. If Couchsurfing makes changes to these Terms, we will provide notice of such changes, including by revising the date at the top of these Terms. Your continued use of our Services following the posting of changes or modifications will constitute your acceptance of such changes or modifications. Accordingly, you should frequently review these Terms and applicable policies and guidelines to understand the terms and conditions that apply to your use of the Services.
title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: They will change the date on the document, and you will be considered to have accepted the change by continuing to use the service.
